0.text: Innate: When Draven catches a  Spinning Axe, kills a non-champion, or destroys a  turret, he gains a stack of Adoration.
0.html: Innate: When Draven catches a Spinning Axe, kills a non-champion, or destroys a turret, he gains a stack of Adoration.
markedPassages: Spinning Axe
turret

1.text: Additionally, whenever Draven kills a  minion or destroys a  ward or  trap, he generates a  Strike stack for 10 seconds, refreshing on subsequent kills and stacking up to 6 times. All Strike stacks are lost if he drops an  axe or a nearby  minion dies without him killing it. The sixth stack consumes all stacks to grant him 2 Adoration stacks.
1.html: Additionally, whenever Draven kills a minion or destroys a ward or trap, he generates a Strike stack for 10 seconds, refreshing on subsequent kills and stacking up to 6 times. All Strike stacks are lost if he drops an axe or a nearby minion dies without him killing it. The sixth stack consumes all stacks to grant him 2 Adoration stacks.
markedPassages: minion
ward
trap
axe
minion

2.text: When Draven kills an enemy  champion, he consumes all of his Adoration stacks and gains  40 + (2.5 × stacks) bonus gold.
2.html: When Draven kills an enemy champion, he consumes all of his Adoration stacks and gains 40 + (2.5 × stacks) bonus gold.
markedPassages: champion
40 + (2.5 × stacks) bonus gold

3.text: Draven loses 75% of his Adoration stacks upon death.
3.html: Draven loses 75% of his Adoration stacks upon death.

0.text: Active: Draven starts spinning his axe, empowering his next basic attack within 5.8 seconds to deal bonus physical damage.
0.html: Active: Draven starts spinning his axe, empowering his next basic attack within 5.8 seconds to deal bonus physical damage.

1.text: Upon hitting the target, the axe then ricochets off of them to land after 2 seconds, with the location being determined by Draven's current movement. If Draven catches the axe, he gains Spinning Axe's empowered attack again.
1.html: Upon hitting the target, the axe then ricochets off of them to land after 2 seconds, with the location being determined by Draven's current movement. If Draven catches the axe, he gains Spinning Axe's empowered attack again.

2.text: Draven can hold up to two Spinning Axes at once.
2.html: Draven can hold up to two Spinning Axes at once.

0.text: Active: Draven enters an adrenaline rush, gaining  bonus attack speed for 3 seconds as well as decaying  bonus movement speed and  ghosting for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Draven enters an adrenaline rush, gaining  bonus attack speed for 3 seconds as well as decaying  bonus movement speed and ghosting for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed
bonus movement speed
ghosting

1.text: Catching a  Spinning Axe resets Blood Rush's  cooldown.
1.html: Catching a Spinning Axe resets Blood Rush's  cooldown.
markedPassages: Spinning Axe
cooldown

0.text: Active: Draven throws a fan of axes in a line in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit,  knocking them aside, though not through terrain, and  slowing them for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Draven throws a fan of axes in a line in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, knocking them aside, though not through terrain, and slowing them for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: knocking them aside
slowing

0.text: Active: Draven hurls two massive axes in the target direction that briefly grant  sight of their surroundings and deal physical damage to enemies hit. Enemy  champions that would have  health left within the current number of  League of Draven stacks are  executed.
0.html: Active: Draven hurls two massive axes in the target direction that briefly grant sight of their surroundings and deal physical damage to enemies hit. Enemy champions that would have  health left within the current number of League of Draven stacks are executed.
markedPassages: sight
champions
health
League of Draven
executed

1.text: Whirling Death can be recast after 1 second while the axes are traveling, and does so automatically after the axes hit an enemy  champion or the edge of the map.
1.html: Whirling Death can be recast after 1 second while the axes are traveling, and does so automatically after the axes hit an enemy champion or the edge of the map.
markedPassages: champion

2.text: Recast: Draven forces the axes to reverse direction, slowly coming to a stop before homing back to him, dealing the same damage to enemies hit.
2.html: Recast: Draven forces the axes to reverse direction, slowly coming to a stop before homing back to him, dealing the same damage to enemies hit.

3.text: Whirling Death deals 100% − 40% (based on enemies hit) damage, resetting upon reversing direction.
3.html: Whirling Death deals 100% − 40% (based on enemies hit) damage, resetting upon reversing direction.

4.text: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
4.html: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
